legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

value.string_value: Beijing's new foreign minister — the former ambassador to the U.S. — says improved relations will take additional effort on both sides.
Opinion | Qin Gang: The planet’s future depends on a stable China-U.S. relationship

legacy.description: Democracy Dies in Darkness
legacy.name: The Washington Post

legacy.full_text:
My farewell Op-ed @washingtonpost, in which I shared beautiful memories of my time in the United States and my vision for a healthy and stable 
China-U.S. relationship. https://t.co/kZs9Sbmg78

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: 我即将结束中国驻美大使任期。前年到任时，中美关系面临着诸多严峻挑战。到任以来，我认真落实两国元首共识，努力做中美之间沟通的桥梁和纽带，致力于探索中美之间正确的相处之道。在此期间，我本人和驻美使馆得到了美国各界人民的大力支持和帮助。对此，我表示衷心感谢。

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: 在过去的500多天，我访问了美国22个州，足迹遍布政府、国会、智库、企业、车间、码头、农田、学校、球场，交了很多朋友。美国人民的勤劳、热情和友善深深地感染了我。

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: 凡是过往，皆为序章。我将一如既往地关心支持中美关系发展，推进中美对话交流和人民相知相亲，推动两国实现相互尊重、和平共处、合作共赢，为两国人民福祉和世界和平、稳定和发展做出应尽努力。

legacy.full_text:

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: I am completing my duty as Chinese Ambassador to the United States. I came to assume office in 2021 at a time of severe challenges for China-US relations.

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: What’s past is prologue. Going forward, I will continue to care about and support the growth of China-US relations, encourage dialogue, mutual understanding and affinity between the two peoples,...

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: ...work for mutual respect, peaceful coexistence and win-win cooperation between our two countries, and make my due efforts for the wellbeing of the two peoples and for world peace, stability and development.

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: Called @SecBlinken to say goodbye. I appreciate several candid, in-depth and constructive meetings with him during my tenure. I look forward to continuing close working relations with him for a better China-US relationship.

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: An inspiring and uplifting 2023 New Year address by President Xi Jinping. As he pointed out that today's China is a country closely linked with the world and we cherish peace and development and value friends and partners as we have always done. https://t.co/Ig5fIIJZZm https://t.co/vqzp2470Zm

legacy.description: 11th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: As we are embracing the first ray of sunshine of 2023, I wish all the friends and partners a happy New Year. I look forward to working closely with you in the New Year for the cause of peace and development for all humanity.

legacy.full_text: China and the US should and can listen to each other, narrow our gap in perceptions of the world, and explore a way to get along based on mutual respect, peaceful coexistence, and win-win cooperation.

media.ext_alt_text: On September 23, 2022, State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi met with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken at the compound of the Permanent Mission of China to the United Nations.
On September 23, 2022, State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi met with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken at the compound of the Permanent Mission of China to the United Nations.

legacy.full_text: SC&FM Wang Yi talked with @SecBlinken today: The two teams have carried out a series of engagements in accordance with the common understandings of the two presidents, which are generally useful. And we should focus on translating their common understandings into practical... https://t.co/ZFS9cKf4Ks

legacy.name: Qin Gang 秦刚

legacy.full_text: policies&concrete actions. The two sides need to step up consultations on the guiding principles for #ChinaUS relations, advance dialogue at various levels & in various fields in an orderly manner, and resolve specific issues btw the two countries through the joint working group.
